name: Music Reading Arcade
description:
Description:
An arcade style game with a time limit to read as many notes as you can! 

How To Play: 

  1. Click on one of the pictures of the clefs that you want to read on. Bass clef or Treble Clef.
  2. The "Start Game" button will be enabled after choosing a clef. Click "Start Game" when you're ready to play!
  3. The picture will change and contain a note on the clef, click the button that corresponds to the note as quickly as possible. "C", "D", "E", "F", "G", "A", "B"
  4. The game ends when the timer runs out and your results will appear in a seperate window as well as on the main game window.

Notes:
Hope you enjoy this application, please don't hesitate to leave a comment or feedback! Thanks!
